load_error.1: After running the project, please get the webview address and paste it into the multidimensional table "Extended Script" for use. See:
title: QR code generator
title.desc: Easily convert URL or text into a QR code / Barcode, and automatically upload it to a multidimensional table as an attachment
select.url.placeholder: Please select the URL field where you want to generate a QR code
select.att.placeholder: Please select the attachment field where you want to save the QR code
select.code.displayValue: Whether to display the bottom text
select.code.text: The text below the barcode (the default is the barcode content)
qrcode.from.record: Generate a QR code from the current view record link (scan the code to directly open the record details)
